description: This source file defines an in-memory implementation of the INotesRepository interface, providing thread-safe CRUD operations for Note objects, and initializes it with a sample note.

classes.name: InMemoryNotesRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory repository implementation for managing Note objects during runtime.

methods.name: InMemoryNotesRepository
methods.description: Constructor initializes the repository with a sample note for convenience.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Returns all notes ordered by last updated timestamp descending.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique GUID if it exists.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Adds a new note to the repository, assigning a new GUID if necessary and setting timestamps.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; returns false if the note does not exist.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes a note by GUID from the repository.
